How can I get information about a specific currency on the Verus testnet using the command line?

You can use the `getcurrency` command to retrieve information about a specific currency on the Verus testnet. The command format is:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrency "CurrencyName"
```
Replace "CurrencyName" with the name of the currency you're interested in.

"MyBrand"
Command-line interface: (this is for testnet, when on mainnet omit -chain=VRSCTEST or for any other PBaaS-chain, just edit VRSCTEST)
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrency "MyBrand"
Now you know everything to launch currencies! 👉 The worldwide community is happy to help on Discord!
